articles.author: Sophie Harris
articles.title: Hay fever: If you have these seven symptoms you could be having an allergic reaction - Express
articles.description: HAY FEVER is an allergic reaction to pollen and many Brits suffer with it every year. There are many different symptoms that come with the different types of allergies. But what are the key symptoms people should be looking out for?

articles.title: Coronavirus: Nurses write to health minister for PPE clarity - BBC News
articles.description: The Royal College of Nursing does not want new guidance about the reuse of PPE implemented in NI.
articles.content:
Image copyrightPAUL ELLIS/AFP
The Royal College of Nursing (RCN) in NI has written to the health minister to seek clarity over the reuse of personal protective equipment (PPE). 
BBC News NI understands the letter was sent after Public Health England changed… [+3930 chars]

articles.title: Making masks at home: What you need to know, plus charts that teach even more - Inverse
articles.description: The recent Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommendation to use cloth face coverings to help slow the spread of COVID-19 has generated numerous how-to articles and videos.
articles.content: The recent Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommendation to use cloth face coverings to help slow the spread of COVID-19 has generated numerous how-to articles and videos. As academics who focus on personal protective equipment (PPE) research and … [+5413 chars]

articles.title: Hay fever or coronavirus: The symptoms compared - BBC News
articles.description: The Royal College of General Practitioners is warning people not to mix up the symptoms.
